mapper.select: SELECT pi.inquiry_id AS inquiryId, pi.pro_id AS proId, pi.content, pi.created_at AS createdAt, u.user_name AS author FROM product_inquiry pi JOIN user u ON pi.user_id = u.user_id WHERE pi.pro_id = #{proId} ORDER BY pi.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_inquiry (user_id, pro_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{proId}, #{content}, NOW())
